meanings.definition: Ichthyosaurs: Extinct marine reptiles that resembled dolphins.
meanings.sent1: The ichthyosaurs swam gracefully in the ancient oceans.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of ichthyosaurs to learn more about them.
meanings.sent3: The ichthyosaurs had a big family reunion under the sea.
meanings.sent4: The ichthyosaurs danced through the water like underwater ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the ichthyosaurs at the museum.

meanings.definition: Ichthyosaurs: A group of reptiles that lived during the Mesozoic Era.
meanings.sent1: During the Mesozoic Era, ichthyosaurs roamed the seas.
meanings.sent2: Many fossils of ichthyosaurs have been discovered in Mesozoic rocks.
meanings.sent3: The Mesozoic Era was like a big party for the ichthyosaurs.
meanings.sent4: The Mesozoic Era was ruled by the mighty ichthyosaurs.
meanings.sent5: The Mesozoic Era was full of colorful ichthyosaurs swimming around.

meanings.definition: Ichthyosaurs: Fossils of these creatures have been found around the world.
meanings.sent1: Paleontologists have unearthed ichthyosaurs fossils in many countries.
meanings.sent2: The discovery of ichthyosaurs fossils helped scientists understand the past.
meanings.sent3: The ichthyosaurs fossils went on a world tour.
meanings.sent4: The ichthyosaurs fossils whispered stories from around the globe.
meanings.sent5: The ichthyosaurs fossils were like ancient travelers sharing their adventures.
